thig6.6:1.1_0: Oh Buddha, my hero: homage to you!
thig6.6:1.4_0: and many other beings as well.
thig6.6:2.3_0: it is developed the noble eightfold path
thig6.6:3.1_0: Previously I was a mother, a son,
thig6.6:3.2_0: a father, a brother, and a grandmother.
thig6.6:3.3_0: Failing to grasp the true nature of things,
thig6.6:4.1_0: For I have seen the Blessed One,
thig6.6:4.2_0: this bag of bones is my last
thig6.6:4.4_0: Now there is no further existence.
thig6.6:5.1_0: I see the disciples in harmony,
thig6.6:5.4_0: this is homage to the Buddhas!
thig6.6:6.1_0: It was truly for the benefit of many
thig6.6:6.2_0: that Māyā gave birth to Gotama.
thig6.6:6.3_0: He swept away the mass of suffering
thig6.6:6.4_0: for those stricken by sickness and death.
